leadStatements: Solving hard problems using Machine Learning. Very interested in NLP and Deep Learning in Computer Vision (Semantic Segmentation, Object Detection, Multi-label classification, etc).

responsibilities.description: Product and software delivery with a focus on Machine Learning.

projects.title: Robo-Finn Machine Learning
projects.subTitle: Machine Learning intiative for a multi-national financial tech client
projects.description: Team lead for building a full-stack financial chatbot

accomplishments.description: Created ML model that correctly identifies and categorizes sentences into Statements, Questions, and Commands. Model correctly identified questions with >97% accuracy on test data.
Built system to automatically scrape and categorize financial data from web. Used ML model to identify and find answers to questions.
Built data pipeline to auto-generate questions/answers for financial chatbot, reducing manual Q&A generation time.
Lead design meetings and determined appropriate tech-stack to build application in.
Lead demo presentations for client company board members and other stakeholders. Communicated complicated technical information to non-technical audience in order to get company buy-in.

projects.title: Exchange Data Network Monitoring/Alerting
projects.subTitle: Monitoring and alerting for a large scale data network of the Japenese Equities trading market
projects.description: Applied DevOps engineering practices to build out monitoring and alerting for a Windows based system

accomplishments.description: Setup monitoring and alerting system for a large scale data network service for the Japanese Equities trading market. System was setup to alert business users when anomalies occurred in the ingested data.
Deployed AWS resources to auto-scale and maintain a high level of reliability in monitoring with little downtime.
Researched multiple offerings and found a solution that saved roughly 10x the cost of other data/monitoring services used by clients.
Solution delivered to the client allowed business to respond at an unprecedented rate to failures in the data network service for the Japanese trading market.

projects.title: Healthcare Navigation Improvement
projects.subTitle: Internfal facing tools for productivity improvement
projects.description: Applied Agile software development practices to build web based tools

accomplishments.description: Created internal facing tools that allowed business to more rapidly update data mapping for doctor and criteria information, improving search results.
Attended discussions and participated in shaping the way for improvements to companies core product offering.
Began rewrite of companies core product offering, a search site for doctors. Improvements include shorter time to results, smarter suggestions, and an upgrade to the latest Angular version.

certificates.certName: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
certificates.school: The department of Computer Science and Engineering

accomplishments.description: Won first placeover all out of over 40 teams and 400 total participants at HackUTA 2018. Team of 4 developers.
Built an AR/VR mixed reality application that would help insurance companies create a better insurance claim process.
